original_title: Queer Tales of Terror : Sucking Hell
overview: Konrad is bright young boy, he is kind of heart and full of joy, but he has a terrible addiction that can only end painfully. See the whole filthy Suck-A-Thumb Legacy for yourself, if you dare! Join Konrad and his fabulous mother for fun frolics and lots of blood.
title: Queer Tales of Terror : Sucking Hell
